questions.question: What is the BEST way to get a past customer to buy again?
options: A) Wait and hope they return
B) Offer a discount for their next purchase
C) Stop selling to new customers

questions.question: What’s a simple follow-up message to increase repeat purchases?
options: A) 'Your glow serum must be finishing soon! Would you like a refill?'
B) 'Thanks for buying. We are closed now.'
C) 'We have new products, but won’t tell you about them.'

questions.question: How to introduce new products to past buyers?
options: A) Never inform them
B) Send a WhatsApp message like 'Want a sneak peek?'
C) Only post and hope they see it

questions.question: How can email marketing build customer loyalty?
options: A) Send personalized recommendations
B) Ignore customers after one purchase
C) Email same message to everyone

questions.question: Best WhatsApp strategy to keep restaurant customers returning?
options: A) Create a WhatsApp group for weekly meal deals
B) Post only on website
C) Send random midnight messages

questions.question: Best way to ask a happy customer for a review?
options: A) 'Could you leave us a short review? It helps our business grow!'
B) 'You must write a long review or we won’t sell to you again.'
C) 'We don’t need reviews.'

questions.question: How to keep weight-loss customers motivated?
options: A) Create a WhatsApp support group
B) Only send marketing messages
C) Hide customer progress

questions.question: How to use referrals to grow your business?
options: A) Give customers a discount for referring friends
B) Increase prices for referrers
C) Ignore word-of-mouth marketing

questions.question: Which is NOT a key sales metric?
options: A) Total sales per month
B) Best-selling product
C) Your favorite customer

questions.question: What should a business do FIRST if repeat sales drop?
options: A) Ask customers for feedback
B) Block customers who don’t buy again
C) Ignore the problem
